languages.text: {n}Дознаватель молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Да, {name}. Ты поступил{mf||а} так, как диктует воля Империума всем простым обывателям. Было ошибкой рассчитывать на то, что ты поймешь, чем отличаются такие, как я, от таких, как ты".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Да, {name}. Ты поступил{mf||а} так, как диктует воля Империума всем простым обывателям. Было ошибкой рассчитывать на то, что ты поймешь, чем отличаются такие, как я, от таких, как ты".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Да, {name}. Ты поступил{mf||а} так, как диктует воля Империума всем простым обывателям. Было ошибкой рассчитывать на то, что ты поймешь, чем отличаются такие, как я, от таких, как ты".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默了一会儿。{/n}“是啊，{name}。这确实是帝国对所有卑微的凡人提出的要求。我本以为你能看到像我这样的人与像你这样的人之间的区别，是我错了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默了一会儿。{/n}“是啊，{name}。这确实是帝国对所有卑微的凡人提出的要求。我本以为你能看到像我这样的人与像你这样的人之间的区别，是我错了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos minutos.{/n} «Sí, {name}. Ha actuado tal y como el Imperium ordena a todos los humildes laicos. Ha sido un error esperar que supiera ver la diferencia entre la gente como usted y la gente como yo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos minutos.{/n} «Sí, {name}. Ha actuado tal y como el Imperium ordena a todos los humildes laicos. Ha sido un error esperar que supiera ver la diferencia entre la gente como usted y la gente como yo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはしばらく沈黙していた。{/n}「そうです、{name}さん。陛下は帝国の意志のままに、謙虚な庶民たちに向き合って行動したのです。陛下は、我のような人間とご自身のような人間の違いがわかると信じたのがそもそも間違いだったようです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはしばらく沈黙していた。{/n}「そうです、{name}さん。陛下は帝国の意志のままに、謙虚な庶民たちに向き合って行動したのです。陛下は、我のような人間とご自身のような人間の違いがわかると信じたのがそもそも間違いだったようです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt kurz.{/n} "Ja, {name}. Ihr habt gehandelt, wie der Wille des Imperiums es all seinen demütigen Laien vorschreibt. Es war ein Fehler, darauf zu vertrauen, dass Ihr den Unterschied zwischen Menschen wie mir und Menschen wie Euch erkennt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schweigt kurz.{/n} "Ja, {name}. Ihr habt gehandelt, wie der Wille des Imperiums es all seinen demütigen Laien vorschreibt. Es war ein Fehler, darauf zu vertrauen, dass Ihr den Unterschied zwischen Menschen wie mir und Menschen wie Euch erkennt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux un moment.{/n} « C'est vrai, {name}. Vous avez agi comme la volonté de l'Imperium le dicte à ses humbles sujets profanes. J'ai commis l'erreur de croire que vous sauriez discerner la différence entre les gens comme moi et les gens comme vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux un moment.{/n} « C'est vrai, {name}. Vous avez agi comme la volonté de l'Imperium le dicte à ses humbles sujets profanes. J'ai commis l'erreur de croire que vous sauriez discerner la différence entre les gens comme moi et les gens comme vous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Evet {name}. İmparatorluk'un naçiz kullarına yakışır bir davranış sergiledin. Kendin gibilerle benim emsallerim arasındaki farkı ayırt edebileceğini düşünmem, benim hatamdı."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "Yes, {name}. You acted as the will of the Imperium dictates to all its humble laypeople. It was a mistake to trust that you would see the difference between people like me and people like you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Evet {name}. İmparatorluk'un naçiz kullarına yakışır bir davranış sergiledin. Kendin gibilerle benim emsallerim arasındaki farkı ayırt edebileceğini düşünmem, benim hatamdı."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
